actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to study the feasibility of using arresting gear at National Airport.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to report to Congress on the feasibility of installing arresting gear on the runway at National Airport, Arlington County, Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to study the feasibility of using arresting gear at National Airport.
